short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays product purchase action on registered YouTube videos.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays product ads on registered videos with a purchase option using polkadot coin. The extension requires the polkadot{.js} extension to function correctly. Link to the extension: https://chromewebstore.google.com/detail/polkadot%7Bjs%7D-extension/mopnmbcafieddcagagdcbnhejhlodfdd
